column5: Private bedroom with full bath in a modern Dallas townhome. 1st floor is all yours! Very comfortable queen sized bed, Apple TV, mini-fridge, complimentary snacks, and private thermostat are all available for guests. Access to private rooftop deck with grill, sectional, and a gorgeous view of Downtown. Centrally located - 5 min to Downtown, Deep Ellum, Uptown and Knox/Henderson.
